member.name: T:Eneter.ProtoBuf.ProtoBufSerializer
member.summary: Implements protocol buffer serialization for Eneter.Messaging.Framework.

member.name: M:Eneter.ProtoBuf.ProtoBufSerializer.Serialize``1(``0)
member.summary: Serializes data using Protocol Buffer binary format.
member.param: protocol buffer generated data class to be serialized.

member.name: M:Eneter.ProtoBuf.ProtoBufSerializer.Deserialize``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Deserializes data from the Protocol Buffer binary format.
member.param: data (byte[]) serialized by protocol buffer to be deserialized
